net.year4000.utilities.sponge

Class AbstractSpongePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.year4000.utilities.sponge.AbstractSpongePlugin
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Utilities

    public abstract class AbstractSpongePlugin
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple way of adding default functions of a sponge plugin
